sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './NewTODO.css' const NewTODO = props => { const day = props.date.toLocaleString('en-US', { day: '2-digit' }) const year = props.date.getFullYear() let month if (props.date.getMonth() + 1 < 10) { month = `0${props.date.getMonth() + 1}` } let icon switch (props.category) { case 1: icon = break case 2: icon = break case 3: icon = break } const removeHandler = () =>{ props.onRemove(props.id) } return (
{icon}

{day + '.' + month + '.' + year}

{props.title}

{props.message}

) } export default NewTODO
